{"rule":"AGREEMENT_SENT_START","sentence":"^\\QAll versions of Microsoft Windows OS are supported, as long as the connector is able to retrieve data using WMI.\\E$"}
{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QSLDatam\\* Searches for processes that begin with \"SLDatam\"\n\\*Dataminer\\* Searches for processes that contain the word \"DataMiner\"\nminer:0* Searches for processes that end with \"miner:0\"\nSLDataminer:0 Searches for the process \"SLDataminer:0\"\n!SLDatam* Searches for processes that do not begin with \"SLDatam\"\n!\\*Dataminer* Searches for processes that do not contain the word \"DataMiner\"\n!miner:0* Searches for processes that do not end with \"miner:0\"\n!SLDataminer:0 Searches for processes that are not equal to \"SLDataminer:0\"\\E$"}
{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QSLDatam\\* Searches for processes that begin with \"SLDatam\"\n\\*Dataminer\\* Searches for processes that contain the word \"DataMiner\"\nminer:0* Searches for processes that end with \"miner:0\"\nSLDataminer:0 Searches for the process \"SLDataminer:0\"\n!SLDatam* Searches for processes that do not begin with \"SLDatam\"\n!\\*Dataminer* Searches for processes that do not contain the word \"DataMiner\"\n!miner:0* Searches for processes that do not end with \"miner:0\"\n!SLDataminer:0 Searches for processes that are not equal to \"SLDataminer:0\"\\E$"}
{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QIn the command prompt window, type winmgmt -standalonehost.\\E$"}
